# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory

# Ignore all hidden files and directories
.*
!.gitignore

# Ignore system-specific files
[Dd]esktop.ini
[Tt]humbs.db
.DS_Store

# Ignore Unity generated files
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/

# Ignore Unity auto-generated files
sysinfo.txt
*.stackdump

# Ignore crash reports
crash-reports/

# Ignore asset meta data
*.pidb
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta
*.mdb.meta
*.ilk
*.map
*.obj
*.pch
*.pdb
*.rsp
*.sbr
*.tlog
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.userprefs
*.csproj
*.tmp

# Ignore any auto-generated files by Unity
/Assets/AssetStoreTools*
/Assets/Standard Assets/ExampleProject*

# Ignore Unity auto-generated folders
.ionide/

# Ignore build directories
/Build/
/[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uilds/
/[Bb]in/
/[Oo]ut/

# Ignore user-specific files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Ignore the main Unity configuration file
ProjectSettings/EditorSettings.asset
ProjectSettings/TagManager.asset
ProjectSettings/TimeManager.asset
ProjectSettings/GraphicsSettings.asset
ProjectSettings/QualitySettings.asset
ProjectSettings/Physics2DSettings.asset
ProjectSettings/PhysicsSettings.asset
ProjectSettings/InputManager.asset
ProjectSettings/PlayerSettings.asset
ProjectSettings/AudioManager.asset
ProjectSettings/DynamicsManager.asset
ProjectSettings/ClusterInputManager.asset

# Ignore auto-generated files
/Assets/Plugins/GitHub/*
/Assets/Plugins/GitHub/Editor/*

# Ignore Unity Package Manager files
Packages/manifest.json
Packages/packages-lock.json

# Ignore Unity Collaborate files
UnityCollaborateAssetID

# Ignore JetBrains Rider files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Ignore Windows-specific files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Ignore macOS-specific files
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Ignore Linux-specific files
.directory
